text: Rollen F. Hans (born April 13, 1931), who also went by Rollie Hans and nicknamed Rollickin' Rollie from Poly, is a retired professional basketball shooting guard who played two seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA) as a member of the Baltimore Bullets despite not being drafted by the league. He attended Long Island University. title: Rollen Hans
